scripts.deploy-with-domain: next build && next export -o docs && git checkout -- docs/CNAME && git checkout -- docs/.nojekyll && git add docs && git commit -m "chore: regen site" && git push origin master
scripts.deploy: next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages"  && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
